description: News about Xi Jinping, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Xi Jinping
title_page: Xi Jinping - The New York Times
maintext:
Xi Tightens His Grip on China at a Difficult Economic Moment
China said its economy grew 3.9 percent in the third quarter. But investors unnerved by Xi Jinping’s power grab — and his state-heavy agenda — sent Chinese shares tumbling.
